snippet.title: Flintlock: Behind the Scenes – A New Dawn
snippet.description:
Take a sneak peek behind the scenes of Flintlock: The Siege of Dawn, the upcoming action-RPG from the makers of Ashen. In the latest video, join the game’s talented creators as they share a glimpse of the epic adventure that awaits. 

Your battle begins in 2022 on PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Steam, Epic Games Store, Xbox One and Xbox Series S|X! Available day one with Game Pass. 

Find out more: https://linktr.ee/playflintlock
